data.name: Professional Baseball Spirits 2024-2025
data.detailed_description:
—The Professional Baseball Spirits series is finally on Steam!

Powered by the next-generation eBaseball™ Engine, Professional Baseball Spirits 2024 delivers a truly immersive baseball experience. Breathtakingly fast line drives, intense player movements, ecstatic cheers from the crowd, engaging commentary that utilizes next-gen AI speech technology ⁠— every movement and every sound of the game is delivered through the power of the revolutionary engine.

Next-generation visuals made possible with Unreal Engine allow for photorealistic hair and skin, rainfall that drenches the field, and other elements that bring the experience to life.

Welcome to the next generation of Professional Baseball Spirits.

――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――

⁠—ABOUT THE PROFESSIONAL BASEBALL SPIRITS SERIES

Professional Baseball Spirits is a professional baseball game series that pursues realism. The first console video game, Pro Baseball Spirits 2004, was released on March 25, 2004. In Professional Baseball Spirits 2015, 3D scanning technology was introduced to capture and recreate professional baseball players from a 360-degree angle. Laser scanning technology also allowed for accurately measured stadiums, providing an unparalleled authentic baseball experience. The mobile game Professional Baseball Spirits A launched in 2015, celebrating its ninth anniversary. It has been downloaded more than 50 million times (as of February 2024).

――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――

DETAIL

Photorealistic hair and skin.

The competitive spark in a player's eyes.

Careful attention to detail brings it all to life.

MOTION

Ball physics have been completely revamped to recreate the speed, gravity, and drag that a ball would have in a real stadium setting.

Innovative improvements to catcher behavior and movement results in authentic pitch framing.

STADIUMS

All stadiums have been meticulously recreated using laser-scanned measurements.

New crowd energy systems control and provide realistic spectator and bench reactions to all the game's ups and downs!

Enjoy the unique beauty of each stadium, down to firework shows carefully designed after their real-life counterparts.

SOUND

Impulse response (IR)* measurements have been used to create rich soundscapes for each stadium, all presented through 3D audio to provide the ultimate immersive experience.

*Data capturing the acoustic characteristics of a real location

――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――

myBALLPARK

Take control of an NPB team as president and GM and aim to become number one in Japan.

Bolster your team's roster by adding players through scouting as GM.

Expand facilities around the ballpark, implement measures to increase attendance, and take responsibility for the team's capital investment and revenue flow as president.

Employ the aid of secretaries, each with a distinct set of abilities, to assemble all the necessary components for building a powerhouse team!

HAKKYU NO KISEKI

Train high school ball players, aim for Koshien, and become the national champions.

Manage your team in games through strategy mode, or take the field as a player in action mode!

Choose from a wide range of detailed and expressive high school, NPB, and older face types with this year's revamped player editor.

SEASON

Build and develop your roster over several generations to create an unstoppable dynasty!

Create and add your own team to NPB with the new team editor, which allows you to customize team uniforms, logos, flags and more!

Your season, your way.

STAR PLAYER

Fine-tune your player's face, playing form, specialized skills, and attributes with the new player editor, then take your customized player on a NPB journey for up to 30 seasons!

Clear missions during games to gain favor from the manager and earn better performance evaluations.

Become a star of the baseball world on and off the field!

――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――

This content uses application protection technology from Denuvo Software Solutions GmbH, and you must be authenticated to use this content. Authentication requires an Internet connection.

data.short_description: Experience stunning visuals and sounds delivered by a powerful new game engine. Celebrate the 20th anniversary of the Professional Baseball Spirits series!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7500 / AMD Ryzen5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX1060(6GB) / Radeon RX470 *4GB VRAM required
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: – Supported Devices Xbox 360 controller, Xbox One controller, Xbox Series X/S controller, PlayStation 4 wireless controller (DUALSHOCK 4), PlayStation 5 wireless controller (DualSense)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit required) / Windows 11 (64bit required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400F / AMD Ryzen5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX3060Ti / Radeon RX6700XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: – Supported Devices Xbox 360 controller, Xbox One controller, Xbox Series X/S controller, PlayStation 4 wireless controller (DUALSHOCK 4), PlayStation 5 wireless controller (DualSense)
